verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old שְׁתֵּ֥ים <WH8147> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵ֛ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> ve-ma-le-Cho; when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim fifty וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <WH2568> ve-cha-Mesh and five שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim. in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as But did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> ha-Ra' [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD כְּתֽוֹעֲבוֹת֙ <WH8441> ke-to-'a-Vot like unto the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <WH3423> ho-Rish had cast out יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּ֗שָׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov, again וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven For he built אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבָּמ֔וֹת <WH1116> hab-ba-Mot, the high places אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נִתַּ֖ץ <WH5422> nit-Tatz had broken down יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu Hezekiah אָבִ֑יו <WH1> 'a-Viv; his father וַיָּ֨קֶם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kem and he reared up מִזְבְּח֤וֹת <WH4196> miz-be-Chot altars לַבְּעָלִים֙ <WH1168> lab-be-'a-Lim for Baalim וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as and made אֲשֵׁר֔וֹת <WH842> a-she-Rot, groves וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <WH7812> vai-yish-Ta-chu and worshipped לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> tze-Va all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of heaven וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> vai-ya-'a-Vod and served אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> 'o-Tam.

וּבָנָ֥ה <WH1129> u-va-Nah Also he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <WH4196> miz-be-Chot altars בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher of which אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar had said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, whereof the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim In Jerusalem יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> yih-yeh- become שְּׁמִ֖י <WH8034> she-Mi shall my name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. be for ever

וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven And he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <WH4196> miz-be-Chot altars לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol for all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> tze-Va for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven בִּשְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> bish-Tei in the two חַצְר֥וֹת <WH2691> chatz-Rot courts בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְהוּא֩ <WH1931> ve-Hu he הֶעֱבִ֨יר <WH5674> he-'e-Vir to pass through אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בָּנָ֤יו <WH1121> ba-Nav his children בָּאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> ba-'Esh the fire בְּגֵ֣י <WH1516> be-Gei in the valley בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <WH2011> hin-Nom, of Hinnom וְעוֹנֵ֤ן <WH6049> ve-'o-Nen also he observed times וְנִחֵשׁ֙ <WH5172> ve-ni-Chesh and used enchantments וְֽכִשֵּׁ֔ף <WH3784> ve-chish-Shef, and used witchcraft וְעָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> ve-'A-sah and dealt א֖וֹב <WH178> ov with a familiar spirit וְיִדְּעוֹנִ֑י <WH3049> ve-yid-de-'o-Ni; and with wizards הִרְבָּ֗ה <WH7235> hir-Bah, much לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot he wrought הָרַ֛ע <WH7451> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסֽוֹ׃ <WH3707> le-hach-'i-So. to provoke him to anger

וַיָּ֕שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem And he set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פֶּ֥סֶל <WH6459> Pe-sel a carved image הַסֶּ֖מֶל <WH5566> has-Se-mel the idol אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah; which he had made בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher of which אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar had said אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him of which God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> da-Vid to David וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh and to Solomon בְנ֔וֹ <WH1121> ve-No, his son בַּבַּ֨יִת <WH1004> bab-Ba-yit In this house הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim, and in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בָּחַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH970> ba-Char-ti young מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> mik-Kol all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> shiv-Tei before all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> 'a-Sim will I put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> she-Mi my name לְעֵילֽוֹם׃ <WH5865> le-'ei-Lom. for ever

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and I will not אוֹסִ֗יף <WH3254> o-Sif, Neither will I any more לְהָסִיר֙ <WH5493> le-ha-Sir remove אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> Re-gel the foot יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> me-'Al from out הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah, of the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הֶֽעֱמַ֖דְתִּי <WH5975> he-'e-Mad-ti which I have appointed לַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> la-'a-vo-tei-Chem; for your fathers רַ֣ק׀ <WH7535> rak but אִם־ <WH518> 'im- so that יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> yish-me-Ru they will take heed לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot, to do אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוִּיתִ֔ים <WH6680> tziv-vi-Tim, all that I have commanded לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all הַתּוֹרָ֛ה <WH8451> hat-to-Rah them according to the whole law וְהַֽחֻקִּ֥ים <WH2706> ve-ha-chuk-Kim and the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <WH4941> ve-ham-mish-pa-Tim and the ordinances בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. of Moses

וַיֶּ֣תַע <WH8582> vai-Ye-ta' to err מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, So Manasseh אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> ve-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot [and] to do רָ֔ע <WH7451> Ra', worse מִן־ <WH4480> min- more הַ֨גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, than the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הִשְׁמִ֣יד <WH8045> hish-Mid had destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh to Manasseh וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo and to his people וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo no הִקְשִֽׁיבוּ׃ <WH7181> hik-Shi-vu. but they would not hearken

וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve brought יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Wherefore the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem, against אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> sa-Rei upon them the captains of הַצָּבָא֙ <WH6635> hatz-tza-Va the host of אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher after לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> le-Me-lech the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> 'ash-Shur, of Assyria וַיִּלְכְּד֥וּ <WH3920> vai-yil-ke-Du which took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh בַּחֹחִ֑ים <WH2336> ba-cho-Chim; among the thorns וַיַּֽאַסְרֻ֙הוּ֙ <WH631> vai-ya-'as-Ru-hu and bound him בַּֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֔יִם <WH5178> ban-chush-Ta-yim, with fetters וַיּוֹלִיכֻ֖הוּ <WH1980> vai-yo-li-Chu-hu and took בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> ba-Ve-lah. him to Babylon

וּכְהָצֵ֣ר <WH6887> u-che-ha-Tzer And when he was in affliction ל֔וֹ lo, חִלָּ֕ה <WH2470> chil-Lah he besought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> pe-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> 'e-lo-Hav; his God וַיִּכָּנַ֣ע <WH3665> vai-yik-ka-Na' and humbled מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> me-'Od, himself greatly מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> mil-lif-Nei accept אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1> 'a-vo-Tav. of his fathers

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> vai-yit-pal-Lel And prayed אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him וַיֵּעָ֤תֶר <WH6279> vai-ye-'A-ter unto him and he was intreated לוֹ֙ lo וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' of him and heard תְּחִנָּת֔וֹ <WH8467> te-chin-na-To, his supplication וַיְשִׁיבֵ֥הוּ <WH7725> vay-shi-Ve-hu and brought him again יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim to Jerusalem לְמַלְכוּת֑וֹ <WH4438> le-mal-chu-To; into his kingdom וַיֵּ֣דַע <WH3045> vai-Ye-da' knew מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, Then Manasseh כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki that יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu he הָֽאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> Ha-'E-lo-Him. he [was] God

וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> ve-'a-cha-rei- Now after this כֵ֡ן <WH3651> chen this בָּנָ֣ה <WH1129> ba-Nah he built חוֹמָ֣ה <WH2346> cho-Mah a wall חִֽיצוֹנָ֣ה׀ <WH2435> chi-tzo-Nah without לְעִיר־ <WH5892> le-'ir- the city דָּוִ֡יד <WH1732> da-Vid of David מַעְרָבָה֩ <WH4628> ma'-ra-Vah on the west side לְגִיח֨וֹן <WH1521> le-gi-Chon of Gihon בַּנַּ֜חַל <WH5158> ban-Na-chal in the valley וְלָב֨וֹא <WH935> ve-la-Vo even to the entering in בְשַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> ve-Sha-'ar gate הַדָּגִים֙ <WH1709> had-da-Gim at the fish וְסָבַ֣ב <WH5437> ve-sa-Vav and compassed לָעֹ֔פֶל <WH6077> la-'O-fel, about Ophel וַיַּגְבִּיהֶ֖הָ <WH1361> vai-yag-bi-He-ha and raised it up מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; a very great height וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem and put שָֽׂרֵי־ <WH8269> sa-rei- captains חַ֛יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil of war בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הֶעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim cities הַבְּצֻר֖וֹת <WH1219> hab-be-tzu-Rot in all the fenced בִּיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> bi-hu-Dah. of Judah

וַ֠יָּסַר <WH5493> Vai-ya-sar And he took away אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei gods הַנֵּכָ֤ר <WH5236> han-ne-Char the strange וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַסֶּ֙מֶל֙ <WH5566> has-Se-mel and the idol מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> mib-Beit out of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all הַֽמִּזְבְּח֗וֹת <WH4196> ham-miz-be-Chot, and all the altars אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בָּנָ֛ה <WH1129> ba-Nah that he had built בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> be-Har in the mount בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וּבִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim; and in Jerusalem וַיַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ <WH7993> vai-yash-Lech and cast ח֥וּצָה <WH2351> Chu-tzah [them] out לָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> la-'Ir. of the city

וַיָּכֶן vai-ya-chen כוַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <WH3559> vai-Yi-ven certain קאֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> miz-Bach the altar יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַיִּזְבַּ֣ח <WH2076> vai-yiz-Bach and sacrificed עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, and זִבְחֵ֥י <WH2077> ziv-Chei offerings שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> she-la-Mim thereon peace וְתוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> ve-to-Dah; and thank offerings וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and commanded לִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> li-hu-Dah, Judah לַעֲב֕וֹד <WH5647> la-'a-Vod to serve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

אֲבָל֙ <WH61> 'a-Val Nevertheless ע֣וֹד <WH5750> od still הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, the people זֹבְחִ֖ים <WH2076> zoe-Chim did sacrifice בַּבָּמ֑וֹת <WH1116> bab-ba-Mot; still in the high places רַ֖ק <WH7535> rak but לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [yet] unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. their God

וְיֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> ve-Ye-ter Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> div-Rei of the acts מְנַשֶּׁה֮ <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh וּתְפִלָּת֣וֹ <WH8605> u-te-fil-la-To and his prayer אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to his אֱלֹהָיו֒ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hav unto his God וְדִבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> ve-div-Rei and the words הַֽחֹזִ֔ים <WH2374> ha-cho-Zim, of the seers הַֽמְדַבְּרִ֣ים <WH1696> ham-dab-be-Rim that spake אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> be-Shem to him in the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel הִנָּ֕ם <WH2005> hin-Nam behold עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- are among דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> div-Rei behold they [are written] in the book מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> mal-Chei of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel
